mapper.select: select s.id, s.date_scheduler,s.note, s.from_ts, s.to_ts, s.editor, s.controller, s.initial_task_1, s.final_task_1, s.initial_shift_1, s.final_shift_1, s.initial_task_2, s.final_task_2, s.initial_shift_2, s.final_shift_2, s.initial_task_3, s.final_task_3, s.initial_shift_3, s.final_shift_3, s.initial_task_4, s.final_task_4, s.initial_shift_4, s.final_shift_4, u.id as scheduled, concat(u.firstname,u.lastname) as name_scheduled from user u left join scheduler s on u.id = s.scheduled
